synthesis_conditions.washing_method: rinsed with DMF, soaked in DMF at 120 °C for 24 h, rinsed with methanol, soaked in methanol at 60 °C for 12 h, repeated four times
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heated at 180 °C under dynamic vacuum (<0.01 mbar) for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.equipment: 1-L three-neck round-bottom flask equipped with a reflux condenser
